features: Durable design includes wear-resistant material, raised wear rails and oversized YKK zippers
Securely attach to rolling luggage with the pass-through panel
Protect and organize smaller items while keeping them easy to access in the patented, crush-resistant SafeZone compartment
Safeguard your identity and personal information with a RFID blocking pocket
Store personal gear in the large main compartment with mesh divider
Protect a 15.6” laptop in the dedicated, padded storage panel
Complies with carry-on requirements for most airlines
Comfortably lift and arrange in overhead bins with top, side and bottom grab handles
Easily convert from a shoulder bag to a backpack with tuck away backpack straps and a removable, padded shoulder strap
Quickly access go to items in exterior zippered pockets
